page.title: 17Religion,West Tytherley.
page.content: Most people in West Tytherley are members of the Church of England though some are Methodists.There is the Parish Church of St.Peter's with the Methodist Chapel nearby.The two cooperate. The Rev.John Page is Vicar of Lockerley,East Dean,East and West Tytherley.About 15 people attend the church regularly and 12 children go to Sunday School.At Easter,Harvest and Christmas many attend the services, though Harvest Service is biennial. The 3 bells in the church are not rung because they are unsafe but a fine clock is maintained by Mr.P.Dawkins. There are plenty of helpers to decorate and clean the church which is unlocked for visitors Fetes raise around Â£800 at this time. Religious beliefs are fundamental in the community,particularly the elderly
